question:
Consider the following:
  1. Firozabad (UP)
  2. Bhagalpur (Bihar)
  3. Jalandhar (Punjab )
  4. Sanganer (Rajasthan)
  5. Kachh (Gujarat )
Which among the following is the correct set of products for which the above places are famous?
option1: Glass Bangles, Silk, Sports material, Hand Block Printing, Salt
option2: Brassware, Cotton, Hosiery Items, Hand Block Printing, Salt
option3: Spices, Sweets, Sports material, Hand Block Printing, Salt
option4: Glass Bangles, Wood items, Sports material, Handicrafts, Salt
answer: Glass Bangles, Silk, Sports material, Hand Block Printing, Salt
